headline: Should You Buy Altria Group Stock Under $60 With a Dividend Yielding 6.85%?
summary: Shares of Altria Group have been soaring because of market uncertainty.  The company is trying to diversify away from cigarettes with little success so far.  The resurgence of tobacco stocks has been an underdiscussed theme in 2025.

headline: Altria Group: Buy This High-Yielding Dividend Star Now
summary: Altria could have a low-double-digit annual total return potential over the next five years. Click here to read my most recent analysis of MO stock.
